title: Data Engineering Zoomcamp - Module 4: Analytics Engineering

slides.author: Data Engineering Zoomcamp
slides.title: Module 4: Analytics Engineering
slides.subtitle: Transform raw warehouse data into analytical views

slides.title: What You'll Learn
slides.body: Build a dbt project on NYC yellow and green taxi data (2019-2020). Transform raw warehouse data into analytical views using modern analytics engineering practices.

slides.title: Analytics Engineering Fundamentals
slides.body: Learn the core principles of analytics engineering and how to structure data transformation workflows for production analytics.

slides.title: Data Modeling Concepts
slides.body: Master dimensional modeling, fact and dimension tables, and how to design analytical schemas that support business intelligence.

slides.title: dbt Core vs dbt Cloud
slides.body: Understand the differences between dbt Core (open-source CLI) and dbt Cloud (managed platform), and when to use each.

slides.title: Project Setup & Structure
slides.body: Set up your dbt project with sources, models, seeds, and macros. Learn how to organize your analytics codebase effectively.

slides.title: Tests, Docs & Commands
slides.body: Implement data quality tests, write documentation, use packages, and master core dbt commands for development and deployment.

slides.title: Common Issues & Troubleshooting
slides.body: Learn how to debug dbt projects, handle dependency issues, optimize performance, and resolve common errors.

slides.supportingText: Big thanks to Juan Manuel Perafan for updating this module, originally recorded by Victoria Perez Mola.
